coreAttributes.name: Excalibur Morgan
coreAttributes.description: Forged by the planet as the crystallization of the wishes of mankind stored and tempered within the planet. It was guarded by extensions of the planet, Fairies, before briefly being passed on to King Arthur by the Lady of the Lake and later returned to the lake before her death.
coreAttributes.equipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(position)] [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan at [npc.her] hip, so that [npc.she] may draw it at a moment's notice.
coreAttributes.unequipText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(sheath)] [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan, before putting it away.

hitDescriptions.hitText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan at [npc2.name], grinning as the ethereal arcane blade travels through [npc2.her] body!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(grin)] as [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] the ethereal blade travel straight through [npc2.her] body!
[npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan, causing [npc2.herHim] to stagger back as the ethereal blade passes right through [npc2.her] chest!

missDescriptions.missText: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slash)] [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan at [npc2.name], but [npc.verb(end)] up missing [npc2.herHim]!
Slashing out at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan, [npc.name] [npc.verb(let)] out a frustrated cry as [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
With a quick step forwards, [npc.name] [npc.verb(slash)] at [npc2.name] with [npc.her] Excalibur Morgan, but [npc.she] [npc.verb(miss)] [npc.her] target!
